thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding Customer Service and great location
thread.title_full: Outstanding Customer Service and great location - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JenRph
title: Outstanding Customer Service and great location
text:
I recently stayed at The Roosevelt Hotel while in New York for a weekend get away with friends. I found the service to be impeccable.The employees we dealt with were friendly, helpful and always willing to assist with any of our needs.
The rooms were definitely a good value for New York standards.
The Roosevelt hotel is a very short walk from Grand Central station making it very convenient for exploring the city.
I highly recommend this property.
